definition: a draft horse harnessed behind others and nearest the wheels of a vehicle
details:
noun
- a draft horse harnessed behind others and nearest the wheels of a vehicle
= synonyms: wheel horse
- a person who rides a bicycle
= synonyms: cyclist, bicyclist, bicycler
- the man at the outermost end of the rank in wheeling
- someone who makes and repairs wooden wheels
= synonyms: wheelwright
